# Grid Layout 2

Layout the items in a grid so that:

- items have minium width of 100px and fill up the space
- place as many items in a row as possible
- gap between items is 10px

```html
<div class="container">
  <div class="item"></div>
  <div class="item"></div>
  <div class="item"></div>
</div>
```

1. width:100px

<img src="data:image/png;base64," width="100">

2. width:150px

<img src="data:image/png;base64," width="150">

3. width:250px

<img src="data:image/png;base64," width="250">

4. width:400px

<img src="data:image/png;base64," width="400">

[Problem Link](https://bigfrontend.dev/css/grid-layout-2)

```css
.item {
  height: 50px;
  background-color: #7aa4f0;
}

.container {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(100px, auto));
  gap: 10px;
}
```
